author: Dorian Kachur
text:
I would like to know howyour organization tracks employees' vacation, sick time or bank time accumulators, and what is considered best practice.
As an example, in our organization our payroll system is set up to reduce a salaried employee's 'regular' pay and 'pay' them vacation pay or sick pay, rather than just maintaining regular pay for the full pay period, and decreasing or adding to the accumulator balance independently.
Thank you for your assistance.
title: Tracking of benefit accumulators
